thread.section_title: St Martins Lane London Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely rooms and great position
thread.title_full: Lovely rooms and great position - Review of St Martins Lane London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mike_Lunch
title: Lovely rooms and great position
text: One of the nicest areas to stay in London and the hotel provides very modern accommodation in a related atmosphere. Very trendy hangouts in the bar and restaurant with young courteous staff. The rooms are finished to a high standard making it a very comfortable stay. The hotel is in the same group as the Covent Garden Hotel which I had stayed in a few months ago. The CGH is more traditional and probably better suited to those like me (over 50), but this one is very good.
